tool_description: Calculates similarity scores between cases based on facts, legal issues, holdings, and other specified comparison criteria.

target_case.description: Citation for the primary case to compare against

comparison_cases.description: Array of case citations to compare with target case

similarity_factors.description: Factors to weight in similarity: facts, issues, holdings, outcomes, reasoning

weighting_scheme.description: How to weight factors: equal, legal_weighted, custom

error_messages: Invalid target case: Target case citation is malformed or inaccessible
Invalid comparison cases: One or more comparison case citations are invalid
Invalid similarity factors: Use valid factors [facts, issues, holdings, outcomes, reasoning]
Invalid weighting scheme: Use one of [equal, legal_weighted, custom]
Too many comparison cases: Limit comparisons to 50 cases maximum
usage: Provide target_case and comparison_cases array. Optionally configure similarity_factors and weighting_scheme. Returns similarity analysis with scores and distinguishing factors.

similarity_scores.description: Overall similarity scores (0-100) for each comparison case

factor_scores.description: Detailed similarity breakdown by factor for each case

distinguishing_factors.description: Key differences that distinguish each comparison case from target

most_similar_cases.description: Top 5 most similar cases with citations
